definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
previous owner (of a car for sale)

sentences.english: Owners decide hourly rental rate and the companies cover the insurance.
sentences.chinese: 車主可以隨時定出租金率而後由公司來購買保險。

sentences.english: Why is the government to charge car-owners who cause the pollution and traffic jams?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼政府要對那些造成污染和交通阻塞的車主收費？

sentences.english: It darkens and lightens for privacy and to control cabin temperatures. Designer: Marko Lukovic
sentences.chinese: 它可以根據車主的喜好來控制車內明暗度和溫度。

sentences.english: Return to fix a rate low, equaled to save to the car owner for a great deal of money and time.
sentences.chinese: 返修率低，等於給車主節省了大量的金錢和時間。

sentences.english: Owners should ensure the mat is “never stacked, ” the agency said.
sentences.chinese: 車主應保證自選腳墊沒有堆疊。

sentences.english: Car-owners, for example, pay no car or road tax.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，當前車主不需要繳納車稅或路稅。

sentences.english: Tinas car and car close beside, displeasure, waiting for the owner.
sentences.chinese: 天娜的車和旁邊的車停得很近，不悅，等待車主。

sentences.english: How many previous owners does this used car have?
sentences.chinese: 這部二手車有過幾位前車主呢？

sentences.english: Car owners can print out appointment forms and apply to change license plates.
sentences.chinese: 車主可憑網上打印的預約單辦理“變號”手續。

sentences.english: But he promised that motorists would save thousands of dollars by cutting their fuel bills.
sentences.chinese: 不過他保證，車主卻可以因此省下幾千美元的汽油費。

sentences.english: Could I have the original owner's phone number, so I can check sin tost he car's history?
sentences.chinese: 我可不可以要原車主的電話，好查一下這輛車的記錄？

sentences.english: Its owner simply does not have money to drive it!
sentences.chinese: 車主連買汽油開它的錢都沒有。

sentences.english: A proud owner poses with his classic car in Trinidad, Cuba.
sentences.chinese: 在古巴特立尼達市一位車主自豪地與他的老爺車合影。

sentences.english: Due to probability of return to repair is low, make car owners save much money and time.
sentences.chinese: 返修率低，等於給車主節省了大量的金錢和時間。

sentences.english: Most finance companies require owners to pay for comprehensive coverage.
sentences.chinese: 大多數財務公司都要求車主購買全險。

sentences.english: Could I have the original owner's phone number, so I can checksintosthe car's history?
sentences.chinese: 我可不可以要原車主的電話，好查一下這輛車的記錄？

definition: to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
